name: 2 Days in the Valley
tagline: 48 hours of intersecting lives and crimes in Los Angeles.

name: Hellbound: Hellraiser II
tagline: Kirsty is brought to an institution after the death of her family, where the occult-obsessive head resurrects Julia and unleashes the Cenobites once again.

name: Mad Dog and Glory
tagline: After his life is saved by a lonely cop, a mobster who moonlights as a standup comic, provides the cop with a friend: a beautiful woman.

name: Wild Orchid
tagline: A woman lawyer becomes mesmerized by a self-made millionaire during an encounter in Rio setting off a series of erotic encounters.

name: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
tagline: Two drag queens and a transsexual travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.

name: House of Flying Daggers
tagline: A romantic police captain breaks a beautiful member of a rebel group out of prison to help her rejoin her fellows, but things are not what they seem.

name: Mrs Henderson Presents
tagline: Laura Henderson buys an old London theater and opens it up as the Windmill, a performance hall which goes down in history for, among other things, its all-nude revues.

name: Michael Collins
tagline: Michael Collins plays a crucial role in the establishment of the Irish Free State in the 1920s, but becomes vilified by those hoping to create a completely independent Irish republic.

name: Lords of Dogtown
tagline: The film follows the surf and skateboarding trends that originated in Venice, California during the 1970's.

name: The Super
tagline: Karma comes into play when a wealthy wisecracking landlord is ordered by a court to live in the filthy building that he runs.

name: Cutthroat Island
tagline: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

name: The Astronaut Farmer
tagline: A NASA astronaut (Thornton), forced to retire years earlier so he could save his family farm, has never given up his dream of space travel and looks to build his own rocket, despite the government's threats to stop him.

name: Adrenaline Rush: The Science of Risk
The Young Victoria
tagline: A dramatization of the turbulent first years of Queen Victoria's rule, and her enduring romance with Prince Albert.

name: Who's Harry Crumb?
tagline: Harry Crumb is a bumbling and inept private investigator who is hired to solve the kidnapping of a young heiress which he's not expected to solve because his employer is the mastermind behind the kidnapping.

name: Antitrust
tagline: A computer programmer's dream job at a hot Portland-based firm turns nightmarish when he discovers his boss has a secret and ruthless means of dispatching anti-trust problems.

name: Doomsday
tagline: A futuristic action thriller where a team of people work to prevent a disaster threatening the future of the human race.

name: Brotherhood of the Wolf
tagline: In 18th century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his native American friend Mani are sent by the King to the Gevaudan province to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.

name: Cookie's Fortune
tagline: Conflict arises in the small town of Holly Springs when an old woman's death causes a variety of reactions among family and friends.

name: Stop-Loss
tagline: A veteran soldier returns from his completed tour of duty in Iraq, only to find his life turned upside down when he is arbitrarily ordered to return to field duty by the Army.

name: The Englishman Who Went Up a Hill But Came Down a Mountain
tagline: When an English cartographer must tell a Welsh village that their mountain is only a hill, the offended community sets out to change that.

name: Jetsons: The Movie
tagline: George Jetson is forced to uproot his family when Mr. Spacely promotes him to take charge of a new factory on a distant planet.

name: Dead Man Down
tagline: In New York City, a crime lord's right-hand man is seduced by a woman seeking retribution.

name: Office Space
tagline: Comedic tale of company workers who hate their jobs and decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

name: Moving
tagline: Arlo accepts what seems to him to be a dream promotion to Idaho. He soon discovers, however, that moving has its own share of problems.

name: Extract
tagline: Joel, the owner of an extract plant, tries to contend with myriad personal and professional problems, such as his potentially unfaithful wife and employees who want to take advantage of him.

name: Gettysburg
tagline: In 1863, the Northern and Southern forces fight at Gettysburg in the decisive battle of the American Civil War.

name: New York Stories
tagline: A middle-aged artist obsessed with his pretty young assistant, a precocious 12 year old living in a hotel, and a neurotic lawyer with a possessive mother make up three stories.

name: Winged Migration
tagline: Documentary on the migratory patterns of birds, shot over the course of three years on all seven continents.

name: Stay Tuned
tagline: A husband and wife are sucked into a hellish TV and have to survive a gauntlet of twisted versions of TV shows they find themselves in.

name: Glengarry Glen Ross
tagline: An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office.

name: Drive Angry
tagline: A vengeful father escapes from hell and chases after the men who killed his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter.

name: RoboCop 3
tagline: Robocop saves the day once more. This time the half man/half robot takes on ruthless developers who want to evict some people on "their" land.

name: Dracula: Dead and Loving It
tagline: Mel Brooks' parody of the classic vampire story and its famous film adaptations.

name: The Package
tagline: Experienced Green Beret sergeant Johnny Gallagher is escorting a prisoner, Airborne Ranger Thomas Boyette, back to the US, but Boyette escapes and Gallagher must risk life and limb to catch him.

name: Moving Violations
tagline: The goofy students of a remedial drivers education class find themselves butting heads with their abusive police instructors.

name: Broadway Danny Rose
tagline: In his attempts to reconcile a lounge singer with his mistress, a hapless talent agent is mistaken as her lover by a jealous gangster.

name: The Purple Rose of Cairo
tagline: In 1930s New Jersey, a movie character walks off the screen and into the real world.

name: After Hours
tagline: An ordinary word processor has the worst night of his life after he agrees to visit a girl in Soho whom he met that evening at a coffee shop.

name: Primeval
tagline: A news team is sent to Burundi to capture and bring home a legendary 25-foot crocodile. Their difficult task turns potentially deadly when a warlord targets them for death.

name: Not Easily Broken
tagline: A car accident and shifting affections test the bond between a married couple.

name: Deconstructing Harry
tagline: Suffering from writer's block and eagerly awaiting his writing award, Harry Block remembers events from his past and scenes from his best-selling books as characters, real and fictional, come back to haunt him.

name: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
tagline: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.

name: Drop Dead Gorgeous
tagline: A small town beauty pageant turns deadly as it becomes clear that someone will go to any lengths to win.

name: Mad City
tagline: A disgruntled security guard holds a school trip group hostage, while a news reporter forms a bond with him.

name: Husbands and Wives
tagline: When their best friends announce that they're separating, a professor and his wife discover the faults in their marriage.

name: We're No Angels
tagline: Two escaped cons only prayer to escape is to pass themselves off as priests and pass by the police blockade at the border into the safety of Canada.

name: Three to Tango
tagline: A rich businessman's assumption that his new colleague is gay leads him to ask the man to keep an eye on his mistress. However, the man is not gay, and begins to fall for the woman himself.

name: Jonah Hex
tagline: The U.S. military makes a scarred bounty hunter with warrants on his own head an offer he cannot refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must stop a terrorist who is ready to unleash Hell on Earth.

name: Scoop
tagline: An American journalism student in London scoops a big story, and begins an affair with an aristocrat as the incident unfurls.

production.name: Canadian Entertainment Investors Number One and Company Limited Partnership

name: Getaway
tagline: To save his kidnapped wife, Brent Magna must drive at the orders of a mysterious man.

name: Here on Earth
tagline: A rich college kid is taught a lesson after a joy ride ends up destroying a country restaurant.

name: Sabotage
tagline: Members of an elite DEA task force find themselves being taken down one by one after they rob a drug cartel safe house.

name: Narc
tagline: When the trail goes cold on a murder investigation of a policeman an undercover narcotics officer is lured back to the force to help solve the case.

name: Home Fries
tagline: Pregnant Sally unknowingly falls for the stepson of the deceased father of her baby and has to deal with his homicidal family.

name: Universal Soldier: The Return
tagline: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army. When the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control

name: Raise Your Voice
tagline: A girl from a small town heads to the big city of Los Angeles to spend the summer at a performing arts high school.

name: The Scarlet Letter
tagline: An affair between a young woman and a pastor has disastrous consequences.

name: Roving Mars
tagline: A pair of uncrewed vehicles transmit images from Mars.

name: Head Over Heels
tagline: A young woman is attracted to a man despite her thinking she's seen him kill someone.

name: The Perfect Score
tagline: Six high school seniors decide to break into the Princeton Testing Center so they can steal the answers to their upcoming SAT tests and all get perfect scores.

name: The Witches
tagline: A young boy stumbles onto a witch convention and must stop them, even after he has been turned into a mouse.

name: Disorderlies
tagline: Three bumbling orderlies are hired to take care of an old rich man. Humorous mayhem follows.

name: Pandorum
tagline: A pair of crew members aboard a spaceship wake up with no knowledge of their mission or their identities.

name: Straw Dogs
tagline: L.A. screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both.

name: I Got the Hook Up
tagline: Two small time scam artists, Black and Blue, sell boom boxes and broken TVs from their van at the parking lot. When, by mistake, a shipment of cellular phones gets to them, it doesn't take long before FBI and gangsters are after them.

name: White Squall
tagline: Teenage boys discover discipline and camaraderie on an ill-fated sailing voyage.

name: The Newton Boys
tagline: The story of the Newton gang, the most successful bank robbers in history, thanks to their good planning and minimal violence.

name: Shopgirl
tagline: A film adaptation of Steve Martin's novel about a complex love triangle between a bored salesgirl, a wealthy businessman and an aimless young man.

name: Someone to Watch Over Me
tagline: A married New York cop falls for the socialite murder witness he's been assigned to protect.

name: The Boondock Saints II: All Saints Day
tagline: The MacManus brothers are living a quiet life in Ireland with their father, but when they learn that their beloved priest has been killed by mob forces, they go back to Boston to bring justice to those responsible and avenge the priest.

name: Whiteout
tagline: U.S. Marshal Carrie Stetko tracks a killer in Antarctica, as the sun is about to set for six months.

name: The Brothers McMullen
tagline: Three Irish Catholic brothers from Long Island struggle to deal with love, marriage, and infidelity.

name: Pathfinder
tagline: A Viking boy is left behind after his clan battles a Native American tribe. Raised within the tribe, he ultimately becomes their savior in a fight against the Norsemen.
